description: QSAR (Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationships) dataset for predicting chemical biodegradability. Contains 1055 chemicals characterized by 41 molecular descriptors to classify compounds as ready biodegradable or not ready biodegradable.

original_source.creator: Milano Chemometrics and QSAR Research Group
original_source.institution: UniversitÃ  degli Studi Milano-Bicocca, Milano, Italy
original_source.publication: Mansouri, K., Ringsted, T., Ballabio, D., Todeschini, R., Consonni, V. (2013). Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship models for ready biodegradability of chemicals. Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling, 53, 867-878.

columns.name: SpMax_L
columns.semantic_description: Leading eigenvalue from Laplace matrix - represents the largest eigenvalue capturing molecular connectivity and branching patterns.

columns.name: J_Dz(e)
columns.semantic_description: Balaban-like index from Barysz matrix weighted by Sanderson electronegativity - measures molecular topology considering atomic electronegativity.

columns.name: nHM
columns.semantic_description: Number of heavy atoms - count of all non-hydrogen atoms in the molecule.

columns.name: F01[N-N]
columns.semantic_description: Frequency of N-N bonds at topological distance 1 - direct nitrogen-nitrogen bonds indicating hydrazine groups.

columns.name: F04[C-N]
columns.semantic_description: Frequency of C-N bonds at topological distance 4 - carbon-nitrogen connectivity separated by 3 bonds.

columns.name: NssssC
columns.semantic_description: Number of atoms of type ssssC - quaternary carbon atoms (C bonded to 4 other atoms).

columns.name: nCb-
columns.semantic_description: Number of substituted benzene C(sp2) - aromatic carbons in substituted benzene rings.

columns.name: C%
columns.semantic_description: Percentage of carbon atoms - proportion of carbons relative to total atom count.

columns.name: nCp
columns.semantic_description: Number of terminal primary C(sp3) - methyl groups and other terminal carbons.

columns.name: nO
columns.semantic_description: Number of oxygen atoms - total count of oxygen atoms in the molecule.

columns.name: F03[C-N]
columns.semantic_description: Frequency of C-N bonds at topological distance 3 - carbon-nitrogen pairs separated by 2 bonds.

columns.name: SdssC
columns.semantic_description: Sum of dssC E-states - electrotopological state indices for sp2 carbons with two single bonds.

columns.name: HyWi_B(m)
columns.semantic_description: Hyper-Wiener-like index (log function) from Burden matrix weighted by mass - molecular size and branching descriptor.

columns.name: LOC
columns.semantic_description: Lopping centric index - measures molecular centrality and branching patterns.

columns.name: SM6_L
columns.semantic_description: Spectral moment of order 6 from Laplace matrix - higher-order molecular connectivity descriptor.

columns.name: F03[C-O]
columns.semantic_description: Frequency of C-O bonds at topological distance 3 - carbon-oxygen pairs separated by 2 bonds.

columns.name: Me
columns.semantic_description: Mean atomic Sanderson electronegativity scaled on carbon atom - average electronegativity of the molecule.

columns.name: Mi
columns.semantic_description: Mean first ionization potential scaled on carbon atom - average energy to remove electrons.

columns.name: nN-N
columns.semantic_description: Number of N hydrazines - count of hydrazine functional groups (N-N bonds).

columns.name: nArNO2
columns.semantic_description: Number of aromatic nitro groups - nitro groups attached to aromatic rings.

columns.name: nCRX3
columns.semantic_description: Number of CRX3 groups - carbon atoms bonded to one R group and three halogens.

columns.name: SpPosA_B(p)
columns.semantic_description: Normalized spectral positive sum from Burden matrix weighted by polarizability - molecular polarizability descriptor.

columns.name: nCIR
columns.semantic_description: Number of circuits - count of molecular rings/cycles in the structure.

columns.name: B01[C-Br]
columns.semantic_description: Presence/absence of C-Br bonds at topological distance 1 - direct carbon-bromine bonds.

columns.name: B03[C-Cl]
columns.semantic_description: Presence/absence of C-Cl bonds at topological distance 3 - carbon-chlorine pairs separated by 2 bonds.

columns.name: N-073
columns.semantic_description: Ar2NH / Ar3N / Ar2N-Al / R..N..R - specific nitrogen-containing substructures.

columns.name: SpMax_A
columns.semantic_description: Leading eigenvalue from adjacency matrix (Lovasz-Pelikan index) - molecular connectivity measure.

columns.name: Psi_i_1d
columns.semantic_description: Intrinsic state pseudoconnectivity index type 1d - atomic-level connectivity descriptor.

columns.name: B04[C-Br]
columns.semantic_description: Presence/absence of C-Br bonds at topological distance 4 - carbon-bromine pairs separated by 3 bonds.

columns.name: SdO
columns.semantic_description: Sum of dO E-states - electrotopological state indices for oxygen atoms.

columns.name: TI2_L
columns.semantic_description: Second Mohar index from Laplace matrix - graph-theoretical molecular descriptor.

columns.name: nCrt
columns.semantic_description: Number of ring tertiary C(sp3) - tertiary carbons within ring structures.

columns.name: C-026
columns.semantic_description: R--CX--R substructure - carbon bonded to heteroatom X and two R groups.

columns.name: F02[C-N]
columns.semantic_description: Frequency of C-N bonds at topological distance 2 - carbon-nitrogen pairs separated by 1 bond.

columns.name: nHDon
columns.semantic_description: Number of hydrogen bond donor atoms - nitrogen and oxygen atoms capable of donating H-bonds.

columns.name: SpMax_B(m)
columns.semantic_description: Leading eigenvalue from Burden matrix weighted by mass - mass-weighted connectivity descriptor.

columns.name: Psi_i_A
columns.semantic_description: Intrinsic state pseudoconnectivity index type S average - averaged atomic connectivity measure.

columns.name: nN
columns.semantic_description: Number of nitrogen atoms - total count of nitrogen atoms in the molecule.

columns.name: SM6_B(m)
columns.semantic_description: Spectral moment of order 6 from Burden matrix weighted by mass - higher-order mass-weighted descriptor.

columns.name: nArCOOR
columns.semantic_description: Number of aromatic esters - ester groups attached to aromatic rings.

columns.name: nX
columns.semantic_description: Number of halogen atoms - total count of F, Cl, Br, I atoms.

target_classes.name: RB
target_classes.meaning: Ready Biodegradable - chemicals that degrade rapidly under aerobic conditions (356 instances, 33.7%)

target_classes.name: NRB
target_classes.meaning: Not Ready Biodegradable - chemicals that do not degrade readily in the environment (699 instances, 66.3%)

dataset_history: Created under the European Community's FP7 Environmental Chemoinformatics (ECO) project. Biodegradation data collected from Japan's National Institute of Technology and Evaluation (NITE). Used to develop QSAR models with k-NN, PLS-DA, and SVM classifiers. The research addresses REACH regulation requirements for biodegradability assessment of chemicals produced/imported >1 ton/year in Europe.
inference_notes: Molecular descriptors calculated using various chemoinformatics software capturing topological, electronic, and physicochemical properties. Ready biodegradable compounds enriched in carboxylic esters, alcohols, and aliphatic chains. Non-ready biodegradable compounds enriched in aromatic substructures and halogen derivatives. The 41 descriptors were selected from a larger set based on their discriminatory power. Class imbalance (33.7% RB vs 66.3% NRB) reflects real-world distribution of chemical biodegradability.
